intro: Combine tiles and face off against anime witches, seductive demons, and powerful queens of darkness!
description:
Battle Puzzle 2048 – Queens of the Abyss puts a wicked spin on the classic 2048 puzzle formula! Slide tiles to combine matching numbers and launch devastating attacks against a legion of otherworldly enemies. Fight your way through demonic temptresses, spellcasting anime witches, and majestic queens of the abyss—each wielding terrifying powers and a flair for the dramatic.
Strategically smash high-value tiles into your foes to deal damage and disrupt their dark magic. Each enemy brings unique abilities to the battle: some hex your tiles, others drain your power, and a few can twist the grid with chaos. With five difficulty levels, the challenge adapts to your skill.
Once you've conquered the darkness, take on Infinite Mode for a pure puzzle experience. Combine tiles, stack up high numbers, and see how long you can survive in the ever-deepening abyss. Will you master the dark and become the ultimate puzzle champion?
